Properties.Name: dhcpGuarding
Properties.Description: DHCP Guarding settings for this Network. If this field is omitted or null, the feature is disabled

Children.Name: trustedDhcpServerIpAddresses
Children.Description: List of trusted DHCP server IP addresses.

GATEWAY.Name: dhcpGuarding
GATEWAY.Description: DHCP Guarding settings for this Network. If this field is omitted or null, the feature is disabled

Children.Name: trustedDhcpServerIpAddresses
Children.Description: List of trusted DHCP server IP addresses.

GATEWAY.Name: isolationEnabled
GATEWAY.Description: Whether this network is isolated from all other networks.

GATEWAY.Name: cellularBackupEnabled
GATEWAY.Description: Whether this network is allowed to use cellular data when WAN connection(s) are down.

GATEWAY.Name: zoneId
GATEWAY.Description: Firewall zone ID associated with this Network.

GATEWAY.Name: internetAccessEnabled
GATEWAY.Description: Whether the internet access is allowed for the device on this network.

GATEWAY.Name: mdnsForwardingEnabled
GATEWAY.Description: Whether this network should participate in mDNS traffic forwarding.

GATEWAY.Name: ipv4Configuration
GATEWAY.Description: Details about IPv4 configuration for this Network.

Children.Name: autoScaleEnabled
Children.Description: Whether the Network can automatically scale its subnet size based on the number of active DHCP leases.

Children.Name: additionalHostIpSubnets
Children.Description: Additional host IP subnets assigned to this VLAN.

Children.Name: dhcpConfiguration
Children.Description: IPv4 DHCP configuration for this network. If this field is omitted or null, DHCP is not working and hosts must get an address statically or from another server in this broadcast domain.

Children.Name: gatewayIpAddressOverride
Children.Description: Gateway IP address provided to DHCP clients. If null, the default gateway will be assigned.

Children.Name: dnsServerIpAddressesOverride
Children.Description: List of DNS servers assigned to client devices by the DHCP server. If none are specified, they will be selected automatically.

Children.Name: leaseTimeSeconds
Children.Description: The lease time in seconds for addresses in this range.

Children.Name: domainName
Children.Description: Domain name that can be used to access network in the browser.

Children.Name: pxeConfiguration
Children.Description: Pre execution environment configuration for network boot

Children.Name: ntpServerIpAddresses
Children.Description: Network Time Protocol (NTP) server IP addresses.

Children.Name: option43Value
Children.Description: Custom DHCP option (43) — the value MUST be the UniFi Network application's host IP address.

Children.Name: tftpServerAddress
Children.Description: Trivial File Transfer Protocol (TFTP) server address — accepts a hostname, URL or IP address.

Children.Name: timeOffsetSeconds
Children.Description: Time offset in seconds from UTC.

Children.Name: wpadUrl
Children.Description: Web Proxy Auto-Discovery (WPAD) URL.

Children.Name: winsServerIpAddresses
Children.Description: Windows Internet Name Service (WINS) server IP addresses.

Children.Name: natOutboundIpAddressConfiguration
Children.Type: Array of object (WAN NAT Outbound Configuration)
Children.Description: List of NAT Outbound Configurations defining which IP addresses are used for NAT translation. This array must contain all WAN interfaces with `static` or `PPPoE` IPv4 connection configuration.

Children.Name: ipAddressSelectionMode
Children.Description: IP address selection mode which determines how the IP address will be selected from the group of IP addresses to translate the traffic on network using NAT.

GATEWAY.Name: ipv6Configuration
GATEWAY.Description: Details about IPv6 configuration for this Network. If this field is omitted or null then IPv6 is not configured on this Network.

Children.Name: clientAddressAssignment
Children.Description: Client Address Assignment

Children.Name: dhcpConfiguration
Children.Description: IPv6 DHCP configuration for this network. At least one addressing method must be active: either enable SLAAC or provide DHCP configuration. If this field is null, SLAAC must be enabled.

Children.Name: start
Children.Description: Start suffix of the DHCPv6 address pool.

Children.Name: stop
Children.Description: End suffix of the DHCPv6 address pool.

Children.Name: leaseTimeSeconds
Children.Description: The lease time in seconds for IP addresses in this range.

Children.Name: slaacEnabled
Children.Description: Allows devices to obtain IPv6 addresses via SLAAC (Stateless Address Autoconfiguration) without DHCPv6. At least one addressing method must be active: either enable SLAAC or provide DHCP configuration.

Children.Name: routerAdvertisement
Children.Description: Router advertisement. Without it, hosts will not autoconfigure addresses and will lack a default route even with DHCPv6.

Children.Name: priority
Children.Description: Router advertisement priority.

Children.Name: dnsServerIpAddressesOverride
Children.Description: The IPv6 DNS server addresses assigned to this Network. If none are specified, they will be selected automatically.

Children.Name: additionalHostIpSubnets
Children.Description: Additional host IP subnets assigned to this VLAN.

Children.Name: prefixDelegationWanInterfaceId
Children.Description: ID of the WAN interface from which the prefix is delegated.

SWITCH.Name: dhcpGuarding
SWITCH.Description: DHCP Guarding settings for this Network. If this field is omitted or null, the feature is disabled

Children.Name: trustedDhcpServerIpAddresses
Children.Description: List of trusted DHCP server IP addresses.

SWITCH.Name: isolationEnabled
SWITCH.Description: Whether this network is isolated from all other networks.

SWITCH.Name: cellularBackupEnabled
SWITCH.Description: Whether this network is allowed to use cellular data when WAN connection(s) are down.

SWITCH.Name: deviceId
SWITCH.Description: ID of the L3 switching capable device that manages this network.

SWITCH.Name: ipv4Configuration
SWITCH.Description: Details about IPv4 configuration for this Network.

Children.Name: autoScaleEnabled
Children.Description: Whether the Network can automatically scale its subnet size based on the number of active DHCP leases.

Children.Name: additionalHostIpSubnets
Children.Description: Additional host IP subnets assigned to this VLAN.

Children.Name: dhcpConfiguration
Children.Description: IPv4 DHCP configuration for this network. If this field is omitted or null, DHCP is not working and hosts must get an address statically or from another server in this broadcast domain.

Children.Name: gatewayIpAddressOverride
Children.Description: Gateway IP address provided to DHCP clients. If null, the default gateway will be assigned.

Children.Name: dnsServerIpAddressesOverride
Children.Description: List of DNS servers assigned to client devices by the DHCP server. If none are specified, they will be selected automatically.

Children.Name: leaseTimeSeconds
Children.Description: The lease time in seconds for addresses in this range.

Children.Name: domainName
Children.Description: Domain name that can be used to access network in the browser.

UNMANAGED.Name: dhcpGuarding
UNMANAGED.Description: DHCP Guarding settings for this Network. If this field is omitted or null, the feature is disabled

Children.Name: trustedDhcpServerIpAddresses
Children.Description: List of trusted DHCP server IP addresses.
